content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSiteDnsTargets path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/delivery/dns/targets content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get cname targets
desc a sites hostname should point to these cname targets in order for traffic to be sent through stackpaths edge nodes
responses
200
wafgetsitednstargetsresponse
type obj
addresses
type str
desc a list of dns cname targets
desc a response from a request to retrieve a waf sites dns cname targets
title: 7_Configuration_GetSiteDnsTargets_43.json
